name: Runs Like Clockwork
description:
A game where you where you make gears that spin. Whether its more gear or quicker gear, the way you build your gears is up to you. But be careful! You need to balance out the Clockwork rotations and the Counter-Clockwork rotations for upgrading do make sure to pay attention to those!.

CONTROLS

- Click and Drag to Move the Camera

- Click on the buttons to create a gear. You can place it down when its near one spinning gear

- Do this till' the end of time
